Articles.Content:
hi,

i have the following problem:

when i try to "Revert Flight" the confirmation window shows no buttons and the text is not where it should be (http://i.imgur.com/QwDevdH.jpg) already tried reinstalling.

so for the moment if i want to abort a flight i have to Alt+F4 KSP and open it up again

i hope someone can help me with that problem cuz it really sucks to play like this particularly cuz im testing a new rocket design ( not in the screenshot )

-Tai
Do you have any mods installed? If so, remove them from your KSP plugin folder (or wherever you place the mods) and then reinstall KSP. It should work, hopefully.

I have exactly this problem too, I can't quite narrow down which mod might have caused it, it might be cause by an interaction between mods? I'm on 0.24.2, disabling all my mods is not a reasonable solution here.

I have the same problem. I have no mods and have no idea whats going on. I'm also getting a lot of times where clicking on the VAB and other things doesn't work and I have to revert to an old save file.

I have the same problem. I have no mods and have no idea whats going on. I'm also getting a lot of times where clicking on the VAB and other things doesn't work and I have to revert to an old save file.

Hi DiggyDogg24,

I'm actually going to refer you to the support forum, and the support sticky. It is difficult for us to guess what your problem might be without more information. It might help us if you can upload a log file and give a brief description of what you are doing. You can post a new thread in the support forum, and you'll likely get help a little faster.

Support Forum: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/76-Support-%28unmodded-installs%29

Support Sticky (how to find your info): http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
